goal.description: Improve client engagement and streamline post-project support systems for Precision Solutions.

subPlans.justification: Enhancing client engagement aligns with Charles's goal-oriented and systematic approach, contributing to the company's success and his professional legacy.

actionItems.what: Conduct client feedback sessions to identify engagement gaps.
Develop a project support framework using collected data.
Train support staff on the new framework.

goal.description: Reduce client onboarding time by 75% within the next six months.

subPlans.justification: This goal supports Charles's value of continuous improvement and efficiency, enhancing client satisfaction and operational effectiveness.

actionItems.what: Analyze current onboarding processes for bottlenecks.
Implement automation tools to streamline onboarding.
Test and refine the new onboarding process.

goal.description: Achieve a 20% increase in client retention within 1 year.

subPlans.justification: Increasing client retention reflects Charles's strategic foresight and data-backed decision-making, ensuring long-term business growth.

actionItems.what: Identify top factors influencing client retention.
Develop a client loyalty program based on data analysis.
Monitor retention metrics and adjust strategy accordingly.
